channel.title: Hello all! Serial entrepreneur and coder by heart here
channel.description:
Hope everyone is doing well. My name is Daniel and I've been programming for the past 25 years or so. A few years back my wife and I created a company (Smart Convos, Inc) which creates conversational marketing tools and solutions.
Being a coder most of my life I sometimes find it hard to transition into the business/marketing side of things, so I look forward to interesting discussions and learning more here. Feel free to message me if you have any questions or need any help as well. :)

item.title: Hello all! Serial entrepreneur and coder by heart here
item.dc:creator: devina
item.description:
Hey Daniel, nice to e-connect here! Are you working on any business idea these days? If you are looking for collaboration in order to validate the idea, handle marketing/ growth, let’s connect.

PS: I am a product manager by profession and an aspiring indie-hacker. Currently, am freelancing with couple startups by helping them with customer research.

Read full topic
item.source: Hello all! Serial entrepreneur and coder by heart here
